title: Interference - min and max amplitude of 2 speakers

content.question:
Two loudspeakers, Speaker <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and Speaker <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, produce sound waves that have the same frequency and are both sinusoidal. The figure shows the two speakers as well as Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math>, where the individual sound waves generated by speakers <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> have amplitudes <math alttext="A sub 1, end sub, equals, 2 A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>A</mi></math> and <math alttext="A sub 2, end sub, equals, 5 A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>A</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>A</mi></math>, respectively.
Relative to Speaker <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, the phase of the sound from Speaker <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is adjusted continuously from <math alttext="0 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn><mo>°</mo></math> to <math alttext="360 degrees" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>360</mn><mo>°</mo></math>. This results in the sound at Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math> having a minimum amplitude <math alttext="A sub min" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>A</mi><mi>min</mi></msub></math> and a maximum amplitude <math alttext="A sub max" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>A</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math> as Speaker <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> is adjusted. What is the ratio <math alttext="A sub min, end sub, to A sub max, end sub" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>A</mi><mi>min</mi></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mi>A</mi><mi>max</mi></msub></math>?
